name: Xmas Zipline
description:
Controls:

  • Z -> Blue light
  • X -> Red light
  • C -> Green light
  • V -> Yellow light
  • ESC -> Pause game

Help the robots climb down the christmas tree by setting on the right set of lights at the right time. How many can you save?

Created during Chill Jam 2023. https://itch.io/jam/chill-jam-mike

Programming, art and music by Juan Cerrone. Follow me here If you like my work :) :
